body_html: Can you use the tensorflow gradient checker to test the gradient of your particular graph? See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/gradient_checker.py and usages of it in the tensorflow tests.
body_text: Can you use the tensorflow gradient checker to test the gradient of your particular graph? See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/gradient_checker.py and usages of it in the tensorflow tests.
body: Can you use the tensorflow gradient checker to test the gradient of your particular graph? See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/gradient_checker.py and usages of it in the tensorflow tests.
